column1: Gun-related deaths by age and sex, United States, 1999-2019

Source:
Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, National Center for Health Statistics. Multiple Cause of Death 1999-2018 on CDC WONDER Online Database, as compiled from data provided by the 57 vital statistics jurisdictions through the Vital Statistics Cooperative Program. Accessed at http://wonder.cdc.gov/mcd-icd10.html
(a) Undetermined means the intentiality of the deaths (unintentional/preventable, homicide, suicide) was not determined.
Note: Dashes (-) indicate category not applicable.
